    Returns a reference to the MoveList that holds the moves of the game, its main variation.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Game.gotoFirst(MoveList moves)
    Navigates the list of moves from the initial position of the game to the first move in the list.
    void
    Game.gotoLast(MoveList moves)
    Navigates the list of moves from the initial position of the game to the last move in the list.
    void
    Game.gotoMove(MoveList moves, int index)
    Navigates the list of moves from the initial position of the game until a given position, defined by the provided index passed in input.
    void
    Game.gotoNext(MoveList moves)
    Navigates the list of moves to the next one in the position.
    void
    Game.gotoPrior(MoveList moves)
    Navigates the list of moves to the previous one in the position.
    void
    Game.setCurrentMoveList(MoveList currentMoveList)
    Sets the current list of moves.
    void
    Game.setHalfMoves(MoveList halfMoves)
    Sets the moves of the game.
